verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the things which we are saying <S%G3004><s%> the chief point <S%G2774><s%> is this <S%G2192><s%>: We have such <S%G5108><s%> a high priest <S%G749><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down on <S%G1722><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> of the Majesty <S%G3172><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%>,

who <S%G3748><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> that which is a copy <S%G5262><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shadow <S%G4639><s%> of the heavenly things <S%G2032><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> is warned of God <S%G5537><s%> when he is about <S%G3195><s%> to make <S%G2005><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%>, See <S%G3708><s%>, saith he <S%G5346><s%>, that thou make <S%G4160><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the pattern <S%G5179><s%> that was showed <S%G1166><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%>.
